## <!-- Based on: https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot/blob/main/instructions/security.instructions.md -->

## description: "Security best practices for Jekyll static sites."

# Security Guidelines

- Avoid inline scripts and styles to reduce XSS risk.
- Use HTTPS for all external resources.
- Do not commit sensitive data or credentials to the repository.
- Keep dependencies up to date (see `Gemfile`).
